title: Blown Away
description: In Blown Away, Jackie and Garrett are forced to deal with several crisis, putting a strain on the team's resources and on their relationship. The trip to Los Altos to find three missing teen boys uncovers a magically dangerous situation which could put their team and their friends at great risk. In addition, a defiant Master Vampire has been infringing on Garrett's territory and a young lion shapeshifter has resorted to violence because he can't face the truth about himself. Even the Demon Realm, now aware of Jackie's connection, has decided to make contact. And to top everything off, Jackie and Garrett face a personal crisis which could end their happiness and start a war with all of Faerie.
author: Gayle Parness
